trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> .

trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> object can represent an element in the project, or a virtual collection of items, containing the items created after evaluating wildcards in the `Include` and `Exclude` attributes of an `Item` element.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> objeto pode representar um elemento no projeto ou uma coleção de virtuais de itens, que contém os itens criado depois de avaliar os caracteres curinga no `Include` e `Exclude` atributos de uma `Item` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> method to add content to the project.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo cria um objeto <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> e usa o método <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> para adicionar conteúdo ao projeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
trans-unit.target: As classes <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> e <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> são usadas para adicionar, remover e alterar itens no projeto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> ao <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> method to add content to the project.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo cria um objeto <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> e usa o método <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> para adicionar conteúdo ao projeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
trans-unit.target: As classes <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> e <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> são usadas para adicionar, remover e alterar itens no projeto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> property value to assign the new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> para atribuir ao novo <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> property value to assign the new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> para atribuir ao novo <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> with the specified <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> and <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> property values to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> com os valores de propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> e <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> ao <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O novo <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> method to add content to the project.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo cria um objeto <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> e usa o método <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> para adicionar conteúdo ao projeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
trans-unit.target: As classes <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> e <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> são usadas para adicionar, remover e alterar itens no projeto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> property value to assign the new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> para atribuir ao novo <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> property value to assign the new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> para atribuir ao novo <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to treat the <c>itemInclude</c> parameter as a literal value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para tratar o parâmetro <c>itemInclude</c> como um valor literal; do contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> with the specified <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> and <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> property values to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />, allowing you to specify whether the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> property value is treated as a literal.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> com os valores de propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> e <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> especificados para o <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />, permitindo que você especifique se o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> é tratado como um literal.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O novo <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup.Condition" /> property value and all <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> objects from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup.Condition" /> e todos os objetos de <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> de <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to create a deep copy of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para criar uma cópia profunda do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep or shallow copy of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia profunda ou superficial do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> references the same property group as the original.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia superficial de uma <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> referencia o mesmo grupo de propriedade original.

trans-unit.source: Modifications a shallow copy will be reflected in both copies.
trans-unit.target: Modificações de que uma cópia superficial aparecerá em ambas as cópias.

trans-unit.source: A deep copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> creates a new XML element to reference so that both copies of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> can be independently modified.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia profunda de uma <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> cria um novo elemento XML para fazer referência para que as cópias do <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> podem ser modificadas de forma independente.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> corresponds directly to a element in the project (rather than corresponding to a collection of items created after evaluating wildcards in the `Include` and `Exclude` attributes of an `Item` element), only deep copies are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> corresponde diretamente a um elemento no projeto (em vez de correspondente a uma coleção de itens criados depois de avaliar curingas no `Include` e `Exclude` atributos de uma `Item` elemento), somente profundas cópias são permitidas.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <c>Condition</c> attribute value of the item group.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de atributo <c>Condição</c> do grupo de itens.

trans-unit.source: The <c>Condition</c> attribute value of the item group.
trans-unit.target: O <c>condição</c> valor do grupo de itens do atributo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the number of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> objects in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica o número de objetos do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> no <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: An integer value representing the number of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> objects in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que representa o número de <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> objetos no <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um enumerador que itera por meio do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the entire <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> para todo o <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que o chamador usar o `foreach` instrução de linguagem c# (`for each` na [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) para percorrer o indivíduo <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem> objetos no <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty><xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> classes to list all the items and properties in the project.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um objeto <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> e usa as classes <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty><xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> e <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> para listar todos os itens e propriedades no projeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the item group was imported into the project.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o grupo de itens foi importado para o projeto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item group was imported into the project; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o grupo de itens foi importado para o projeto. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> object to get or set.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do objeto <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> a ser obtido ou definido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> object in this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto de <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> nesse <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> object in this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> objeto neste <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> especificado do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> method to add content to the project.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo cria um objeto <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> e usa o método <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> para adicionar conteúdo ao projeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
trans-unit.target: As classes <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> e <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> são usadas para adicionar, remover e alterar itens no projeto.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> object to remove.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do objeto <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> at the specified index from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> no índice especificado do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> objects in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" /> to a new array.
trans-unit.target: Copia os objetos do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> no <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" /> para uma nova matriz.

trans-unit.source: A new array containing the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> objects copied from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova matriz que contém os objetos do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> copiados do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
